attributes.additional_details: THE RESULT OF THE REFERENDUM SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES.  THE BRITISH PEOPLE WANT TO STAY BRITISH.  WE NEED HIS IMPUT IN THE FORTHCOMING EXIT DEAL
attributes.background: NIGEL FARAGE HAS WORKED INCREDIBLY HARD FOR ENGLAND TO REGAIN IT'S ROOTS AND DEMOCRACY CAUSING A REFERENDUM ON MEMBERSHIP OF THE EU.  WITHOUT HIM THIS REFERENDUM WOULD NEVER HAVE TAKEN PLACE.  WE WILL NOW HAVE CONTROL OF OUR COUNTRY, IMMIGRATION, DEMOCRACY AND KEEP OUR ROYAL FAMILY.
